casebody.data:
Charles UDOH, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
ENTERPRISE RENTAL CAR INC., and John Mattone, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Christopher G. Turner, Defendant. C-817 September Term 2017
080139 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001861-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
